title: Circles surround
content: im startin a project about circles, and ive chosen to produce a poster for my band 'betty swallox' for some reason weve called this gig 'circles surround' and it was handy that this project theme came up really but im so stuck with ideas that i want to hear somethin new from you people.please!
author: jarvis

comments.content:
Have a over head shot of a drummer and his drum set. The circler shapes could be the "circles" that "surround" him.   
   
What do you think?
not bad, pretty cool, well done, keep em comin people!
4x post, we have a new record!
